channel.title: Posts on Jim Mitchell
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jim Mitchell

item.title: Yasu, Resurrected
item.description: I’ve been thinking about bringing Yasu back to life for a long time. This is the beginning of that journey.

item.title: A Better Applescript to Compress Files or Folders
item.description: I had the need to select several folders at once in the Mac OS Finder and zip them up as individual archives. This AppleScript was the solution I came up with.

item.title: Applescript to Add Empty Files in the macOS Finder
item.description: I needed to create a bunch of txt files in a folder, but needed a way to do it quickly.

item.title: Applescript to Toggle the Desktop
item.description: Hereâ€™s an AppleScript I use to quickly toggle desktop visibility for taking screenshots and recording screencasts that I thought might be useful for others.
